comments:
I'm running Eclipse 3.2 with all the correct components. After upgrading to 0.1.5 I get this error when I highlight a variable in this type of statement: $this->variable (From right to left ONLY)

The variable was initially declared like 'var $variable' (its an old class) but I've updated the line to 'public $variable'. I still get the error regardless.

So far this error has only occurred for ONE of the variables I have declared. None of the other variables show this behavior

(I believe this part of the Code Assist but I could definitely be wrong)
